name: QR Scan Analytics
query:
SELECT 
    DATE(scan_timestamp) as "Date:Date:120",
    target_doctype as "DocType:Data:120",
    action_taken as "Action:Data:150",
    COUNT(*) as "Scan Count:Int:100",
    COUNT(DISTINCT scanned_by) as "Unique Users:Int:120",
    scanned_by as "User:Link/User:150"
FROM `tabQR Scan Log`
GROUP BY DATE(scan_timestamp), target_doctype, action_taken, scanned_by
ORDER BY scan_timestamp DESC
